title: make sure to configure league ticket table dates successfully
mlb tickets/pricing page Icons validation
custom_steps:
1. Validate the following Icons in Web and in Mobile
Left/right arrows for date selection

Dropdown arrows for filter category selection

Mobile only: +/- icons for filter section

Close Icon for filter removal

Promo icons

X close icon in promo popup

Accordion arrow icons in the section/group level.

title: mlb ticketing dynamic ads icon validation
custom_steps:
1. Go to VSM to make sure the dynamic ads is setup (above VSM) page
2. Go to mlb ticketing (https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/brewers/tickets/da/qa-test/728x90)
3. Change the size to 300x250, 160x600 , 300x600 , 728x90 ( four sizes)
4. make sure the up, down, left and right arrows shows up and able to move the list of ads using the arrows
custom_expected:
1. Set up should be available
2. page should display with ads
3. as the numbers changes ads sizes should be changes
4. should be able to move the list of ads using the arrows

title: mlb_ticketing tiered-pricing page Icon validation
custom_steps:
1 go to https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/brewers/tickets/tiered-pricing-test
2. Verify the Green tickets icon (only if there is a ticket link)
3. Verify the X close icon after clicking the ‘View Pricing’ button
custom_expected:
1. tiered-pricing should be launched 
2. should appear
3. should appear

title: make sure to configure league ticket table dates successfully
Verify that when Pricing Spotlight lay out set to Lowest in forge same layout appears on webpage
Verify that when Pricing Spotlight lay out set to featured in forge same layout appears on webpage
Verify that when Pricing Spotlight lay out set to LowestFeatured in forge same layout appears on webpage
Verify that when EventTicketPromotionPrice param is setup it should respects on webpage
Verify that when EventTicketPromotionPrice param "leave_empty_games" is setup it should respects on webpage
Verify that when EventTicketPromotionPrice param "Begin_date" is setup it should respects on webpage
Verify that when EventTicketPromotionPrice param "end_date" is setup it should respects on webpage
Verify the same basic layout is forge shows up on webpage
custom_preconds:
Access to CSM forge
Team needs to be configured between forge-webpage
Webpage test url should be provided
custom_steps:
1 Go to Forge CMS QA (under homepage-~brewershomepageindex)
https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/vsm/siteexplorer/content/~/brewers/homepage/index
2. click on edit and verify the Upcoming Games - Properties
3. go to test url http://web-apps-x-homepage-186.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/brewers
custom_expected:
1.Forge CMS QA should be accessible
2.Upcoming Games - Properties should be as below
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118329)

3.url should take you the test webpage and the Upcoming Games section style should matched with Forge properties.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118330)

title: Verify when there is a change to the boolean fields same be respected on webpage
custom_preconds:
Access to CSM forge
Team needs to be configured between forge-webpage
Webpage test url should be provided
custom_steps:
1 Go to Forge CMS QA (under homepage-~brewershomepageindex)
https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/vsm/siteexplorer/content/~/brewers/homepage/index
2. click on edit and verify the Upcoming Games - Properties 
3. Make changes to the ( FROM ON TO OFF) a) make change b) save it & c) publish it
'Hide Component' 
'Hide T-Links'
'Hide 'All Tickets' Link'
4. go to test url http://web-apps-x-homepage-186.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/brewers
custom_expected:
1.Forge CMS QA should be accessible
2.Upcoming Games - Properties should be as below
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118329)
3. Change should be successfully published
4.url should take you the test webpage and the Upcoming Games section style should matched with Forge properties.
Any field thats turned off should not show the same icon
'Hide Component'=> Entire section
'Hide T-Links'=>Individual game Tickets icon
'Hide 'All Tickets' Link'=>All Tickets icon
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118330)

title: Verify the service name as "EventTicketPromotion" setup in Forge
Verify the service name as "EventTicketPromotion" in VSM component
custom_preconds:
Access to CSM forge
Team needs to be configured between forge-webpage
Webpage test url should be provided
custom_steps:
1 Go to Forge CMS QA (under homepage-~brewershomepageindex)
https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/vsm/siteexplorer/content/~/brewers/homepage/index
2. click on edit and verify the Upcoming Games - Properties 
3. go to Forge component https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/wcm/custom/vsmticketcomponent/87341237-8821-40ba-8c94-6c950568640c
and veriy the service name is set to EventTicketPromotion
4. go to test url http://web-apps-x-homepage-186.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/brewers
custom_expected:
1.Forge CMS QA should be accessible
2.Upcoming Games - Properties should be as below
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118329)
3. service name should be set to EventTicketPromotion
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9119056)

4.url should take you the test webpage
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118330)

title: Verify when param of EventTicketPromotion change same is appears on webpage
custom_preconds:
Access to CSM forge
Team needs to be configured between forge-webpage
Webpage test url should be provided
custom_steps:
1 Go to Forge CMS QA (under homepage-~brewershomepageindex)
https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/vsm/siteexplorer/content/~/brewers/homepage/index
2. Make no changes to property
3. go to Forge component https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/wcm/custom/vsmticketcomponent/87341237-8821-40ba-8c94-6c950568640c
Update the below params. a) update the param b) apply change
year
offer_group
leave_empty_games
4. go to test url http://web-apps-x-homepage-186.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/brewers
custom_expected:
1.Forge CMS QA should be accessible
2.Upcoming Games - Properties should be as below
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118329)
3. service name should be set to EventTicketPromotion
4.url should take you the test webpage
![](index.php?/attachments/get/9118330)

title: Verify when rollback is done at forge end the saved change should not show on webpage
custom_preconds:
Access to CSM forge
Team needs to be configured between forge-webpage
Webpage test url should be provided
custom_steps:
1 Go to Forge CMS QA (under homepage-~brewershomepageindex)
https://forge-web.cms-qa.mlbinfra.com/?iss=https%3A%2F%2Fmlb.okta.com#/vsm/siteexplorer/content/~/brewers/homepage/index
2. click on edit and verify the Upcoming Games - Properties 
save the change and then rollback the change
3. go to test url http://web-apps-x-homepage-186.webeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/brewers
custom_expected:
1.Forge CMS QA should be accessible
2.Upcoming Games - Properties should be as below
4.url should take you the test webpage and previous change should still be there
